abstract_summ: For diagnosis of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), a SARS-CoV-2 virus-specific reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) test is routinely used . However, this test can take up to 2 d to complete, serial testing may be required to rule out the possibility of false negative results . In a test set of 279 patients, the proposed AI system achieved an area under the curve of 0.92 and performed equally in sensitivity compared to a senior thoracic radiologist .
